main event: On August 8, 1958, a civilian reported observing a brilliant unidentified flying object that came from the west-northwest and disappeared in the southwest.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 12 seconds,The object was described as elliptical in shape with brilliant lights on the underside,Two other individuals in the area reported seeing similar UFOs around the same time,A meteor was suggested as a probable explanation,The sighting occurred while the individual was watching a drive-in movie.
witness description: A husband and wife, along with two other residents of the area.
